Reference

Handle snapshots

Datasets to snapshot

take_snapshot()

Snapshots datasets and the configuration file

Generic datasets

ald_description

Description of a generic ald dataset

Demo datasets

ald_demo

An asset level dataset for demonstration

data_dictionary()

A dataset that defiles the columns of r2dii datasets

iso_codes

A dataset linking country names with their ISO code

loanbook_demo

A loanbook dataset for demonstration

overwrite_demo

A demonstration dataset used to overwrite specific entity names or sectors

region_isos

A dataset outlining various region definitions (using iso codes)

scenario_demo

A climate scenario dataset for demonstration

Datasets to look up sector-classification codes

isic_classification nace_classification naics_classification

Datasets to bridge (translate) common sector-classification codes

Datasets from the Reference repository

BENCH.REGIONS()

Dataset to bridge from country to all existing bench regions it is in

INDEX.REGIONS()

Dataset to identify the equity index regions based on the MSCI factsheets

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
